Variance:

$\sigma^{2} = \frac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n} \left(x_{i} - \bar{x}\right)^{2}} {n-1}$

Standard deviation:

$\sigma = \sqrt{\frac{\sum\limits_{i=1}^{n} \left(x_{i} - \bar{x}\right)^{2}} {n-1}}$

Margins of error (proportions)

$$me = +/- z * \sqrt{\frac{p(1-p)} {n-1}}$$
